com.emc.atmos.api.jersey

Class AtmosApiBasicClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.atmos.api.AbstractAtmosApi
      • com.emc.atmos.api.jersey.AtmosApiClient
        • com.emc.atmos.api.jersey.AtmosApiBasicClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtmosApi

    public class AtmosApiBasicClient
extends AtmosApiClient
    Extension of AtmosApiClient that does *not* use the commons-http client and instead uses the default Jersey client (URLConnection). Note that this implementation does not support the Expect: 100-continue header.

    • Field Summary
